mapper.insert: INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_GRP_M ( CD_GRP_ID, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, CD_GRP_NM, CD_GRP_DESC, UP_CD_GRP_ID, EFCT_ST_DATE, EFCT_ED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{CD_GRP_ID}, #{DEL_YN}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CRET_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CRETR_ID}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CHG_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CHGR_ID}, #{CD_GRP_NM}, #{CD_GRP_DESC}, #{UP_CD_GRP_ID}, TO_DATE(#{EFCT_ST_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), TO_DATE(#{EFCT_ED_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )

INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_CD_M ( CD_GRP_ID, CD_ID, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, CD_NM, CD_DESC, SORT_NO, USE_YN, UP_CD_GRP_ID, UP_CD_ID, EFCT_ST_DATE, EFCT_ED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{CD_GRP_ID}, #{CD_ID}, #{DEL_YN}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CRET_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CRETR_ID}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CHG_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CHGR_ID}, #{CD_NM}, #{CD_DESC}, #{SORT_NO}, #{USE_YN}, #{UP_CD_GRP_ID}, #{UP_CD_ID}, TO_DATE(#{EFCT_ST_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), TO_DATE(#{EFCT_ED_DATE}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )

INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_TYPE_M ( OBJ_TYPE_ID, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, OBJ_TYPE_NM, OBJ_TYPE_DESC, SORT_NO, UP_OBJ_TYPE_ID, HIER_LEV_NO, LST_LEV_YN, ATR_ADM_CD, STLM_YN, HST_YN, TAG_YN, CMMT_YN ) VALUES ( #{OBJ_TYPE_ID}, #{DEL_YN}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CRET_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CRETR_ID}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CHG_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CHGR_ID}, #{OBJ_TYPE_NM}, #{OBJ_TYPE_DESC}, #{SORT_NO}, #{UP_OBJ_TYPE_ID}, #{HIER_LEV_NO}, #{LST_LEV_YN}, #{ATR_ADM_CD}, #{STLM_YN}, #{HST_YN}, #{TAG_YN}, #{CMMT_YN} )

INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_TYPE_ATR_D ( META_TYPE_CD, OBJ_TYPE_ID, ATR_ID_SEQ, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, ATR_ID, ATR_ALIAS_NM, SORT_NO, MULTI_ATR_YN, CNCT_ATR_YN, MAND_YN, ATR_ADM_TGT_YN, DEGR_NO, INDC_YN, FIND_TGT_NO, AVAIL_CHK_PGM_ID, UI_COMP_WIDTH_RADIO, UI_COMP_HEIGHT_PX ) VALUES ( #{META_TYPE_CD}, #{OBJ_TYPE_ID}, #{ATR_ID_SEQ}, #{DEL_YN}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CRET_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CRETR_ID}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CHG_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CHGR_ID}, #{ATR_ID}, #{ATR_ALIAS_NM}, #{SORT_NO}, #{MULTI_ATR_YN}, #{CNCT_ATR_YN}, #{MAND_YN}, #{ATR_ADM_TGT_YN}, #{DEGR_NO}, #{INDC_YN}, #{FIND_TGT_NO}, #{AVAIL_CHK_PGM_ID}, #{UI_COMP_WIDTH_RADIO}, #{UI_COMP_HEIGHT_PX} )

INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M ( OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, ADM_OBJ_ID, OBJ_NM, OBJ_ABBR_NM, OBJ_DESC, PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID, PATH_OBJ_ID ) VALUES ( #{OBJ_TYPE_ID}, #{OBJ_ID}, #{DEL_YN}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CRET_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CRETR_ID}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CHG_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CHGR_ID}, #{ADM_OBJ_ID}, #{OBJ_NM}, #{OBJ_ABBR_NM}, #{OBJ_DESC}, #{PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID}, #{PATH_OBJ_ID} )

INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_D ( OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, ATR_ID_SEQ, ATR_VAL_SEQ, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, OBJ_ATR_VAL ) VALUES ( #{OBJ_TYPE_ID}, #{OBJ_ID}, #{ATR_ID_SEQ}, #{ATR_VAL_SEQ}, #{DEL_YN}, #{CRET_DT}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CRET_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CRETR_ID}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CHG_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{OBJ_ATR_VAL} )

INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_R ( OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID, REL_OBJ_ID, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, REL_TYPE_ID, OBJ_REL_ANALS_CD ) VALUES ( #{OBJ_TYPE_ID}, #{OBJ_ID}, #{REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID}, #{REL_OBJ_ID}, #{DEL_YN}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CRET_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CRETR_ID}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{CHG_DT}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{CHGR_ID}, #{REL_TYPE_ID}, #{OBJ_REL_ANALS_CD} )
